meanings.def: connected with God or a god; considered to be holy
examples: The place was sacred to the Apaches.
the feeling that all life should be held sacred

meanings.def: very important and treated with great respect; that must not be changed or challenged
examples: Human life must always be sacred.
For journalists nothing is sacred (= they write about anything).
Some companies offer five-year plans but there is nothing sacred about this length of time (= it can be changed).
